name: Grimmly Ever After
description:
The black forest is beckoning for you; it encases you in its darkness. The yellow brick road stretches on for miles, a place no man wants to be alone, a place where anything can happen. Will you live Grimmly Ever After?

Controls

  • Click/Space to Advance Dialog
  • Right Click/Left Shift/F Hold to Speed Up Dialog
  • Escape to exit to title

Made by Jamie Macalik, Sammy Mahmoudi, and Erin England
